ActiveFiltersBar: A horizontally scrollable filter bar with removable tags, clear all functionality, and navigation controls; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use when filters are empty as the component returns null automatically.
Alert: A compact alert component with colored backgrounds, warning icons, and text content for notifications; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS displays a solid colored background (warning/secondary/error) and NEVER renders without proper variant styling.
AlertMultiline: A multi-line alert component supporting lists, links, buttons, and info tooltips with warning icon and customizable content; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for single simple messages - use the standard Alert component instead.
AvatarDriver: A driver avatar displaying profile photo, name, license plate, and optional transportation icon in a horizontal layout; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires a license plate prop and NEVER renders driver information without proper photo dimensions.
Avatar: A versatile avatar component that displays user photos with fallback to colored initials when images fail to load; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS uses a solid colored background with white text for initials and NEVER renders without proper size dimensions.
BadgeStatus: A rounded status badge with solid colored backgrounds for indicating states; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for status text that consists only of an icon and colored text without a background.
TagBubble: A rounded tag bubble with optional remove button for filter tags and selectable items; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for status indicators that require background colors - use BadgeStatus instead.
BannerCarousel: An autoplay banner carousel with navigation controls, dot indicators, and external link support; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires banner image URLs and NEVER renders empty - returns null when no banners provided.
BottomSheet: A mobile-first bottom sheet modal with header, content, and footer sections built on Vaul primitives; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for desktop-centric modals - use Modal component instead.
InfoBottomsheet: A specialized bottom sheet for displaying information content with standardized layout; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes a close button and NEVER renders without proper content structure.
RadioBottomsheet: A bottom sheet containing radio button selections with proper form validation; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for simple selections without radio functionality - use standard form controls instead.
Breadcrumb: A hierarchical navigation component showing the current page path with clickable links; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes the current page as non-clickable text and NEVER renders without proper breadcrumb items.
Button: A versatile button component with multiple visual variants for MuatTrans and MuatParts applications; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper variant specification as it defaults to muattrans-primary styling.
Calendar: A date selection calendar with Indonesian locale, custom day buttons, and range selection support; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS uses Indonesian date formatting and NEVER renders without proper locale configuration.
DataTableBO: A comprehensive data table component with search, pagination, sorting, and responsive design; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires properly formatted data arrays and column definitions and NEVER renders without table configuration.
DateTimePickerResponsive: A responsive date-time picker that adapts layout for mobile and desktop screens; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper responsive design considerations - always test on both mobile and desktop.
DateTimePickerWeb: A web-specific date-time picker optimized for desktop interactions; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS designed for desktop use and NEVER used in mobile contexts.
DatePickerResponsive: A mobile-first date picker using native date input with Indonesian formatting and validation; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS uses native date picker functionality and NEVER renders without proper date formatting.
DatePickerWeb: A web date picker with popover calendar interface and auto-apply functionality; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes calendar popover with date selection and NEVER renders without proper date handling.
FileUploadButton: A comprehensive file upload button with progress tracking, validation, and preview functionality; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes file validation and proper error handling and NEVER accepts files without type checking.
PhoneInput: An international phone number input with country selection, validation, and formatting; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes country code selection and proper phone number formatting and NEVER renders without proper validation.
TableBO: A flexible table component with sortable headers, hover states, and responsive design; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires proper column definitions and NEVER renders without table structure configuration.
ConditionalDiv: A conditional wrapper component that renders its children only when conditions are met; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for simple conditional rendering - use standard React conditional patterns instead.
BarChart: A responsive bar chart component with customizable data and interactive tooltips; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires properly formatted data arrays and NEVER renders empty.
DonutChart: A donut chart component for displaying proportional data with interactive segments; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for time-series data - use LineChart instead.
LineChart: A line chart with area fill and interactive tooltips for displaying trends over time; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires properly formatted income/date data and NEVER renders without proper axis configuration.
Collapsible: A collapsible component with smooth animations for expanding/collapsing content; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper trigger mechanisms - always provide clear user controls.
CropperPreviewResponsive: A responsive image cropper preview that adapts to different screen sizes; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS maintains aspect ratio constraints and NEVER renders without proper image data.
CropperPreviewScreen: A full-screen image cropper preview with zoom and pan capabilities; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper user controls for navigation.
CropperResponsive: A responsive image cropping component with mobile and desktop adaptations; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes aspect ratio controls and NEVER renders without proper image source.
CropperScreen: A full-screen image cropping interface with comprehensive editing tools; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for simple image uploads - use basic cropper components instead.
CropperWeb: A web-optimized image cropper with desktop-specific interactions; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS designed for desktop use and NEVER used in mobile contexts.
CropperWebNew: An enhanced web image cropper with improved user interface and features; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper error handling for image processing.
DisplayOptionsBar: A toolbar for switching between different display modes (grid/list/etc); **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes active state indicators and NEVER renders without display options.
Dropdown: A flexible dropdown system with nested hover menus, filter triggers, and positioning controls; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper accessibility attributes - always include ARIA labels and keyboard navigation.
DropdownMenu: A specialized dropdown menu component with item selection capabilities; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes proper item selection handlers and NEVER renders without menu items.
SimpleDropdownMenu: A simplified dropdown menu for basic selection scenarios; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for complex nested menus - use the full Dropdown component instead.
SimpleDropdown: A simplified dropdown component built on SimpleDropdownMenu with trigger and items support; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires proper trigger element and item array for rendering.
Dropzone: A file upload dropzone with drag-and-drop functionality and progress tracking; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes file validation and NEVER accepts files without proper type checking.
ResponsiveFooter: A responsive footer component that adapts layout and content for mobile and desktop; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper responsive breakpoints - always test on all screen sizes.
ButtonPlusMinus: A plus/minus button component for increment/decrement operations; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes value validation and NEVER allows invalid number ranges.
Checkbox: A standard checkbox component with proper form integration and styling; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper form context - always include name and value attributes.
DimensionInput: A specialized input for dimensions with unit conversion support; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes unit validation and NEVER accepts invalid dimension formats.
Form: A comprehensive form component with validation, error handling, and submission management; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper validation rules - always include error states.
Input: A versatile input component with icons, error handling, and reset functionality; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes proper validation states and NEVER renders without proper type attributes.
NumberInput: A number-specific input with validation, min/max constraints, and formatting; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper number validation - always validate input ranges.
OtpInput: A one-time password input with automatic focus advancement and paste support; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS maintains exact character count and NEVER allows partial OTP submission.
RatingInput: A star rating input component with fractional rating support; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper value persistence - always include current rating state.
Select: A dropdown select component with search, grouping, and custom rendering; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes proper option handling and NEVER renders without options array.
TagInput: An input component for adding/removing tags with validation; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper tag validation - always validate tag formats.
TextArea: A multi-line text input with character counting and validation; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes proper row/column attributes and NEVER renders without proper validation.
SimpleHoverMenu: A simple hover-activated menu with basic navigation items; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper hover delay - always include reasonable timing.
IconComponent: A versatile icon component supporting multiple formats and loading states; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes proper alt text and NEVER renders without valid icon sources.
ImageComponent: An enhanced image component with loading states, error handling, and optimization; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper image dimensions - always include width/height attributes.
Lightbox: An image lightbox with zoom, navigation, and full-screen viewing capabilities; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes keyboard navigation support and NEVER traps focus without proper escape handling.
LoadingInteractive: An interactive loading component with progress indicators and user controls; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper cancellation mechanisms - always allow user interruption.
LoadingStatic: An SSR-friendly loading overlay that always renders full-screen with backdrop blur; **Crucial Rule:** NEVER removes itself programmatically - requires parent component to control visibility.
MapContainer: A map container component with basic map functionality; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper map provider configuration - always include API keys and settings.
MapWithPath: A map component with route path visualization and location markers; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS requires proper coordinate data and NEVER renders without valid path information.
ConfirmationModal: A specialized modal for confirmations with standardized action buttons; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper confirmation handlers - always include cancel/confirm actions.
ConfirmationModalResponsive: A responsive confirmation modal that adapts to different screen sizes; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes mobile-optimized buttons and NEVER renders without proper responsive breakpoints.
Modal: A comprehensive modal system with controlled/uncontrolled states and multiple variants; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper accessibility attributes - always include ARIA labels and focus management.
NotificationCount: A notification count badge with customizable styling and positioning; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS displays numeric counts and NEVER renders without proper count values.
NotificationDot: A simple notification dot indicator for unread states; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use for numeric counts - use NotificationCount instead.
Popover: An accessible popover component with proper positioning and trigger mechanisms; **Crucial Rule:** ALWAYS includes proper close mechanisms and NEVER traps focus without proper escape handling.
RadioButton: A radio button component with proper form integration and group management; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper name attributes - always group radio buttons correctly.
ScrollArea: A custom scroll area component with styled scrollbars and overflow handling; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper overflow configuration - always set appropriate scroll behavior.
Timeline: A versatile timeline component for displaying sequential events with different variants; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper event ordering - always maintain chronological sequence.
Toaster: A global toast notification system with responsive positioning and animations; **Crucial Rule:** NEVER renders without proper store context and ALWAYS requires Zustand store integration.
InfoTooltip: An informational tooltip with HTML content support and proper positioning; **Anti-Pattern:** DO NOT use without proper trigger mechanisms - always include clear hover/focus states.
